casebody.data:
D. S. Showkeir, Sr., et Al. v. Russell Hodge, by &c. November 17, 1932.

Present, Campbell, C. J., and Holt, Epes, Hudgins, Gregory and Browning, JJ.

Taylor & Taylor and Charles Curry, for the defendant in error.

Richmond

Timberlake & Nelson and J. H. May, for the plaintiffs in error.
